text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, az cizhoi pokizae, ki ʙa dast ovardaed va az on ci az zamin ʙaroi şumo ʙarovardaem, infoq kuned; va ʙa suroƣ [-i moli] nopok naraved, ki az on infoq namoed; dar hole ki xudaton hozir ʙa paziruftanaş nested, magar ʙo caşmpūşī [va ʙemajlī] nisʙat ʙa on; [pas, cī guna cizero, ki ʙaroi xud namepisanded, ʙaroi Alloh taolo ravo medored]? Va ʙidoned, ki Alloh taolo ʙenijozu sutuda ast
